TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HotSpot extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class HotSpot Implements IStateManager
public ref class HotSpot abstract : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 實作對所有作用點圖形通用的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to all hot spot shapes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法直接建立執行個體的抽象類別。You cannot directly create instances of the abstract class. 相反地，此類別會繼承由， ，和類別提供的通用的基本功能的作用點。Instead, this class is inherited by the , , and classes to provide the common basic functionality for a hot spot. 您必須衍生自類別來建立自訂的作用點類別，表示您定義一個唯一的圖形。You must derive from the class to create a custom hot spot class that represents a unique shape that you define. 不過，您可以定義使用的大部分圖形， ，和類別。However, you can define most shapes using the , , and classes. 當中按一下控制項時，網頁瀏覽至 URL、 產生回傳至伺服器，或是不執行任何動作。When a in an control is clicked, the page either navigates to a URL, generates a postback to the server, or does nothing. 屬性會指定此行為。The property specifies this behavior. 若要瀏覽至 URL，設定屬性`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 使用屬性來指定要瀏覽至 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要張貼至伺服器，設定屬性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. 使用屬性，以指定的名稱物件。Use the property to specify a name for the object. 此名稱將會傳入事件資料時按一下物件。This name will be passed in the event data when the object is clicked. 如果您想沒有任何行為來設定物件屬性`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. 或者，您可以使用上包含的屬性控制項以指定物件的行為。Alternately, you can use the property on the containing control to specify a object's behavior. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

para.span: 當您繼承自 時，您必須覆寫下列成員： 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

protected: HotSpot();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別建構函式來初始化此類型中的狀態會呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type. 類別為抽象，因此無法直接執行個體化。The class is abstract and therefore cannot be instantiated directly.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string AccessKey { get; set; }
.property instance string AccessKey
Public Overridable Property AccessKey As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ AccessKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可讓您快速巡覽至 區域的便捷鍵 (Access Key)。

span.span: Gets or sets the access key that allows you to quickly navigate to the region.

value.span: 可快速巡覽至 區域的便捷鍵。

span.span: The access key for quick navigation to the region.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的鍵盤快速鍵區域。Use the property to specify the keyboard shortcut for a region. 這可讓您快速地巡覽至地區鍵盤上按 ALT 鍵和指定的字元。This allows you to navigate quickly to the region by pressing the ALT key and the key for the specified character on the keyboard. 例如，將設定的便捷鍵區域以字串"D"表示使用者可以按下 ALT + D 巡覽至控制項。For example, setting the access key of a region to the string "D" indicates that the user can navigate to the control by pressing ALT+D. 只包含單一字元字串所允許之屬性。Only a single character string is allowed for the property. 如果您嘗試設定此屬性的值既不是`null`， ，也為單一字元字串，擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to set this property to a value that is neither `null`, , nor a single character string, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 只在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本支援此屬性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

exception.span: 指定的便捷鍵不是 、空字串 ("")，或單一字元字串。

span.span: The specified access key is neither , an empty string (""), nor a single character string.

Public Overridable Property AlternateText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當影像無法使用或呈現至不支援影像的瀏覽器時，要針對 控制項中的 物件顯示的替代文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text to display for a object in an control when the image is unavailable or renders to a browser that does not support images.

value.span: 當 控制項的影像無法使用時，取代 顯示的文字。

span.span: The text displayed in place of the when the control's image is unavailable.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示的文字物件存放至控制映像時所指定屬性是無法使用。Use the property to specify the text to display for a object in an control when the image specified by the property is unavailable. 當控制項呈現至瀏覽器不支援映像，而不是顯示影像、 超連結呈現每個中控制項。When an control is rendered to a browser that does not support images, instead of displaying an image, it renders a hyperlink for each in the control. 控制項擷取每個超連結從顯示的文字每個屬性。The control retrieves the text to display for each hyperlink from the property for each . 當使用者按一下其中一個超連結時，它的行為類似任一個瀏覽至指定的 URL，產生回傳至伺服器，或不進行任何動作。When a user clicks one of the hyperlinks, it behaves like a by either navigating to a specified URL, generating a postback to the server, or doing nothing. 當控制項轉譯為支援的值的工具提示功能的瀏覽器屬性會顯示為工具提示。When the control renders to a browser that supports the ToolTips feature, the value of the property is displayed as a ToolTip for the . 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode HotSpotMode { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode HotSpotMode
Public Overridable Property HotSpotMode As HotSpotMode
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpotMode HotSpotMode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpotMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpotMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定按一下 時， 控制項中 物件的行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的行為物件存放至負責控制何時按下。Use the property to specify the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked. 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`| 使用由 控制項的 屬性所設定的行為。The uses the behavior set by the control's property. 如果控制項不會定義行為物件瀏覽至 URL。If the control does not define the behavior, the objects navigate to a URL.| |`Inactive`| 沒有任何行為。The does not have any behavior.| |`Navigate`| 巡覽至 URL。The navigates to a URL.| |`PostBack`| 產生回傳給伺服器。The generates a postback to the server.| 您可以指定行為上的屬性的控制項，或在屬性的每個個別物件。You can specify behavior on either the property of the control or on the property of each individual object. 如果已設定這兩個屬性，指定每個個別屬性物件會優先於屬性控制項。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.NotSet`如個別物件，取得從包含其行為控制項的屬性。If you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the property of an individual object, the gets its behavior from the containing control's property. 在此案例中，如果控制項的屬性的值可能是未設定或設為`HotSpotMode.NotSet`的預設行為是瀏覽至 URL。In this scenario, if the control's property is either not set to a value or is set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet`, the default behavior is to navigate to a URL. 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.Navigate`如屬性物件物件瀏覽至 URL，在按下作用點區域時。If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for the property of a object, the object navigates to a URL when the hot spot region is clicked. 使用屬性來指定要瀏覽至 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.PostBack`如屬性物件物件產生回傳至伺服器時按下。If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for the property of a object, the object generates a post back to the server when the is clicked. 使用屬性，以指定的名稱。Use the property to specify a name for the . 此名稱將會傳入上發生回傳事件的事件資料。This name will be passed in the event data on when a postback event occurs. 當回傳按一下時，就會引發事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 若要以程式設計方式控制執行動作時回傳是按下，提供的事件處理常式事件。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 若要讓所有中的物件控制項有相同的行為，請設定上每個個別屬性物件`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或並未指定的值屬性。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要指定不同的行為，如中的物件控制，請設定上每個個別屬性物件設為 `HotSpotMode.Navigate`， `HotSpotMode.PostBack`，或`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。To specify different behaviors for objects in an control, set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, or `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制項的屬性或屬性它所包含的物件未設定的值，或設為`HotSpotMode.NotSet`，則行為是預設`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。If an control's property or the property on the objects it contains is either not set to a value or set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet`, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.Inactive`如屬性，按一下時其物件不具有任何行為。If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the property, the object does not have any behavior when it is clicked. 您可以使用此值來建立較大的作用中作用中的非作用中作用。You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot. 提供此選項可讓您建立更複雜的作用點區域內控制項。This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot-spot zones within an control. 若要建立作用中的作用中的非作用中區域，您必須指定非使用中的作用點之前在使用中的作用點控制項。To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active hot spot in the control. 例如，下列藉由指定非使用中的圓形作用點較大 active 圓形作用點內定義一個使用中的環形：For example, the following defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` ```

exception.span: 指定的型別不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

span.span: An that represents the object to restore.

summary.span: 將 物件先前儲存的檢視狀態還原至物件。

span.span: Restores the object's previously saved view state to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 衍生自訂中的實作時，將會使用主要由控制項開發人員的方法類別。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 這個方法會還原檢視狀態資訊物件所儲存的先前頁面要求從方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: virtual System::Object ^ SaveViewState();

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來 物件檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object's view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 物件檢視狀態變更的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the object's view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與物件相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂實作，從主要由控制項開發人員使用成員類別。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值，然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control's life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[IIS 5.0 和 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式生命週期概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Application Life Cycle Overview for IIS 5.0 and 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f). 儲存檢視狀態時，這個字串物件會傳回至用戶端為儲存在隱藏的 HTML input 項目中的變數。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率`ViewState`屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

span.span: if a object is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用成員以決定是否物件正在追蹤檢視狀態變更。Typically, you should use the member to determine whether a object is tracking view-state changes. 成員是明確介面成員實作。The member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它可用時，才執行個體轉換成介面。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義用於追蹤的檢視狀態的自訂實作物件，請覆寫成員。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for tracking view state for a object, override the member.

para.span: 明確介面實作會呼叫屬性來判斷物件是否正在追蹤檢視狀態變更。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the property to determine whether the object is tracking view-state changes.

MemberSignature.Value: void IStateManager.LoadViewState (object savedState);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object) Implements IStateManager.LoadViewState
virtual void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.LoadViewState(System::Object ^ savedState) = System::Web::UI::IStateManager::LoadViewState;

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，含有要還原之 物件的已儲存檢視狀態值。

span.span: An that contains the saved view state values for the object to restore.

summary.span: 將 物件先前儲存的檢視狀態還原至物件。

span.span: Restores the object's previously saved view state to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用成員，才能還原檢視狀態的物件。Typically, you should use the member to restore the view state for a object. 成員是明確介面成員實作。The member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它可用時，才執行個體轉換成介面。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義自訂的實作來還原檢視狀態物件，請覆寫成員。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for restoring view state for a object, override the member.

para.span: 明確介面實作會呼叫方法來還原檢視狀態的物件。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to restore the view state for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: object IStateManager.SaveViewState ();
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState() cil managed
Function SaveViewState () As Object Implements IStateManager.SaveViewState
virtual System::Object ^ System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState() = System::Web::UI::IStateManager::SaveViewState;

summary.span: 儲存自上次頁面回傳至伺服器以來 物件檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object's view state since the last time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 物件檢視狀態變更的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the object's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法來儲存檢視狀態的區域。Typically, you should use the method to save the view state for the region. 方法是明確介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它可用時，才執行個體轉換成介面。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義用於追蹤的檢視狀態的自訂實作物件，請覆寫成員。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for tracking view state for a object, override the member.

para.span: 明確介面實作會呼叫方法來儲存物件的檢視狀態變更。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to save view-state changes for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: void IStateManager.TrackViewState ();
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed
Sub TrackViewState () Implements IStateManager.TrackViewState
virtual void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() = System::Web::UI::IStateManager::TrackViewState;

summary.span: 指示 區域追蹤其檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Instructs the region to track changes to its view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法來開始追蹤檢視狀態變更區域。Typically, you should use the method to start tracking view-state changes for the region. 方法是明確介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它可用時，才執行個體轉換成介面。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義用於追蹤的檢視狀態的自訂實作物件，請覆寫成員。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for tracking view state for a object, override the member.

para.span: 明確介面實作會呼叫方法來初始化物件的檢視狀態追蹤。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to initialize view-state tracking for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual short TabIndex { get; set; }
.property instance int16 TabIndex
Public Overridable Property TabIndex As Short
public: virtual property short TabIndex { short get(); void set(short value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 區域的定位索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab index of the region.
The tab index of the region.

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷索引標籤索引Web Form 網頁上的區域。Use the property to specify or determine the tab index of a region on the Web Forms page. 當您按下 TAB 鍵時，Web 伺服器控制項接收焦點的順序由每個控制項的屬性。When you press the TAB key, the order in which the Web server controls receive focus is determined by the property of each control. 一開始載入頁面，按下 TAB 鍵時接收焦點的第一個項目時，[網址] 列。When a page is initially loaded, the first item that receives focus when the TAB key is pressed is the address bar. 接下來，Web Form 頁面上的控制項被定位的遞增順序，根據值屬性的每個控制項，從最小正整數，則為非零值開始。Next, the controls on the Web Forms page are tabbed to in ascending order, based on the value of the property of each control, starting with the smallest positive, nonzero value. 如果多個控制項都共用相同的索引，控制項將會接收焦點 Web Form 網頁上宣告它們的順序。If multiple controls share the same tab index, the controls will receive focus in the order they are declared on the Web Forms page. 最後，具有零的定位點索引控制項被定位宣告它們的順序。Finally, controls that have a tab index of zero are tabbed to in the order they are declared. > [!NOTE] > 只有具有非零值索引標籤索引的控制項將呈現`tabindex`屬性。Only controls with a nonzero tab index will render the `tabindex` attribute. 您可以移除從藉由設定定位順序的地區為負數值的屬性。You can remove a region from the tab order by setting the property to a negative value. > [!NOTE] > 只在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本支援此屬性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later.

exception.span: 指定的定位索引不在 -32768 和 32767 之間。

span.span: The specified tab index is not between -32768 and 32767.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定按一下巡覽至 URL 的 物件時，要顯示所連結之 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked.

value.span: 按一下巡覽至 URL 的 物件時，要載入所連結之 Web 網頁的目標視窗或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的框架或視窗顯示網頁的連結時按一下瀏覽至 URL 的物件。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked. 此屬性沒有作用時，才屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.Navigate`、 瀏覽的 URL。This property has an effect only when the property is set to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, to navigate to a URL. 如果未設定這個屬性，在瀏覽器或具有焦點的視窗會重新整理時按一下物件。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the object is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target` XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許錨定項目上的屬性。The `target` attribute on ANCHOR elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 請勿設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出為必須 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > [!CAUTION] > 我們強烈建議，當建立可存取網頁，請避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。We strongly recommend that, when creating accessible Web pages, you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必須以中範圍的 A 到 Z （不區分大小寫），除了下列的特殊值，其中以底線開頭字母為開頭。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine whether the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Internet Explorer 5.0 或更新版本支援`_search`目標值。For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 or later supports the `_search` target value.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToString ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 傳回 物件之這個執行個體的 表示。

span.span: Returns the representation of this instance of a object.

returns.span: 表示這個 物件的字串。

span.span: A string that represents this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回字串，代表目前物件。The method returns a string that represents the current object. 例如，如果目前的執行個體類別，呼叫這個方法會傳回字串"CircleHotSpot"。For example, if the current is an instance of the class, calling this method returns the string "CircleHotSpot".

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void TrackViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub TrackViewState ()
protected: virtual void TrackViewState();

summary.span: 讓 物件追蹤其檢視狀態的變更，以便將這些變更儲存在物件的 物件中。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the object's object.

summary.span: 這個物件可透過 屬性存取。

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂實作，從主要由控制項開發人員使用成員類別。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 由 ASP.NET 自動呼叫這個方法時物件初始化。This method is called automatically by ASP.NET when the object is initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.UI.StateBag ViewState { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.StateBag ViewState
Protected ReadOnly Property ViewState As StateBag
protected: property System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ ViewState { System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得狀態資訊的字典，允許您在相同頁面的多個要求之間，儲存和還原 物件的檢視狀態。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 類別的執行個體，包含 區域的檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the region's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂實作，從主要由控制項開發人員使用成員類別。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 伺服器控制項的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要保留這些值在 HTTP 要求，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用屬性，這是執行個體的類別，以儲存屬性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use the property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 值是然後當做變數傳遞到隱藏的 HTML 項目時處理後續要求。The values are then passed as a variable to a hidden HTML element when subsequent requests are processed. 如需儲存伺服器控制項檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 檢視狀態所有的伺服器控制項的預設啟用，但您會想要停用它的情況下。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances in which you will want to disable it. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 效能概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 字典和使用方式的相關資訊，請參閱[集合和資料結構](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872).
